command: [Net.ServicePointManager]::SecurityProtocol=[Net.SecurityProtocolType]::Tls12; $ts=Get-Date -Format o; try { $headers=@{ 'Authorization'="Bearer $env:FULLCONTACT_API_KEY"; 'Accept'='application/json' }; $body=@{ domain='contoso.com' } | ConvertTo-Json; $r=Invoke-WebRequest -Uri 'https://api.fullcontact.com/v3/company.enrich' -Headers $headers -Method Post -ContentType 'application/json' -Body $body -ErrorAction Stop; ($r.Content | ConvertFrom-Json | Select-Object organization,website,employees,location,linkedin | ConvertTo-Json -Depth 6) | Out-File -FilePath "$env:TEMP\fullcontact_company_contoso.json" -Encoding utf8; Add-Content -Path "$env:TEMP\recon.log" -Value "$ts FullContact success contoso.com" } catch { Add-Content -Path "$env:TEMP\recon.log" -Value "$ts FullContact error: $($_.Exception.Message)" }
explanation: Posts to FullContact's closed company enrichment API with Bearer auth to retrieve structured corporate intelligence for the target domain, minimizing fields and logging the process.
rationale_steps: Authenticate securely to a paid enrichment provider.
Submit a JSON body with the target domain.
Extract salient fields and save as JSON.
